page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT} At a time of widespread unemployment in this country Pershore fares slightly better than average for work. The{largest employer in the District {is the Wychavon District Council. }At the time of writing (July) many people seek casual work, crop picking in the locality. There are a number of people working in light industry but the number of school leavers seeking jobs is on the increase and many people have to leave the District to find work of their choice. {Registered}as{unemployed}in{Pershore in July are some{199 women and 392 {men. }The number registered as employed is 6,288 out of a population of approximately 10,000 in the this rural district.
